Jogo do caralho vai toma no cu

So much cheaters in the game.
It's not like this game is Free-to-Play like Valorant, and Valve makes so much money from the game yet does nothing to address some of the worst issues of the game.
I only played MM, so just name a few:
- cheaters as mentioned (the biggest reason of all, what game doesn't implement proper anti-cheat?)
- matchmaking randomly stops (this has been a nuissance lately, happened to me 9-times in a row at peak)
- unable to join lobby (happens sometimes, but when it does it's super frustrating, tried to restart csgo > steam > pc, and sometimes even after all these it still fails to join)
- 64-tick server instead of 128
- all the times we get CSGO-ed by the glitches?
- broken matchmaking (matching a team of MG1 vs a team of LE???)
- report system that doesn't work (obvious cheaters still roam free in MM)
- coach bug in big events (e.g. ESL and probably Major, doesn't affect the regular players but it's so baffling)
As much as I love this game, it's so hard to recommend this game to anyone else and telling them this 10-year-old game is still full of cheaters + unresolved problems.
